com.yantra.yfc.rcp

Class YRCUserPreferenceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yantra.yfc.rcp.YRCUserPreferenceManager

  • public class YRCUserPreferenceManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manager class which provides list of features to handle user preferences.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  YRCUserPreferenceManager.UserPreferenceData
      If user preference action is registered then UserPreferenceData class instance will be null.
